resource_data:
<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">
  <identifier>
    <catalog>hdl</catalog>
    <entry>10494/107546</entry>
  </identifier>
  <identifier>
    <catalog>expression-cmr-id</catalog>
    <entry>107546</entry>
  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oercommons.org</catalog>
            <entry>1770206633</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Silencing Genomes</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Zum Schweigen bringen Der Genome</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Amortissement des Génomes</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Silenciando Genomes</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Fare tacere I Genomes</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Να κατασιγάσει γονιδιώματα</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Silenciar Genomas</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">introduces us to RNAi, a mechanism by which biologists down-regulate gene expression and observe the physiological consequences. A series of experiments demonstrate the power of RNAi in a model organism (roundworm C. elegans). Videos, animations, interviews with experts, and other materials are provided.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Social Sciences</string>
          </keyword>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">stellt uns zu RNAi, eine Einheit vor, durch die 
Biologen Genausdruck unten-regeln und die physiologischen Konsequenzen
beobachten. Eine Reihe Experimente zeigen die Energie von RNAi 
in einem vorbildlichen Organismus (Spulwurm C. elegans). Videos,
Animationen, Interviews mit Experten und andere Materialien werden zur
Verfügung gestellt.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">nous présente à RNAi, un mécanisme par lequel 
les biologistes vers le bas-règlent l'expression de gène et 
observent les conséquences physiologiques. Une série 
d'expériences démontre la puissance de RNAi dans une organization 
modèle (elegans d'ascaride lombricoïde C.). Videos, 
animations, entrevues avec des experts, et d'autres matériaux sont 
fournis.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">introduz-nos a RNAi, um mecanismo por que os 
biólogos para baixo-regulam a expressão do gene e observam as 
conseqüências physiological. Uma série das experiências 
demonstra a potência de RNAi em um organismo modelo (elegans da 
lombriga C.). Videos, os animations, as entrevistas com peritos,
e outros materiais são fornecidos.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">li introduce a RNAi, un meccanismo da cui i 
biologhi giù-regolano l'espressione del gene ed osservano le 
conseguenze fisiologiche. Una serie di esperimenti dimostra 
l'potenza di RNAi in un organismo di modello (elegans dell'ascaride 
C.). Videos, le animazioni, le interviste con gli esperti ed 
altri materiali sono forniti.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">μας εισάγει σε RNAi, ένας μηχανισμός από τον οποίο
οι βιολόγοι κάτω-ρυθμίζουν την έκφραση γονιδίων και παρατηρούν 
τις φυσιολογικές συνέπειες. Μια σειρά πειραμάτων 
καταδεικνύει τη δύναμη RNAi σε έναν πρότυπο οργανισμό 
(roundworm Γ. elegans). Τα βίντεο, οι ζωτικότητες, οι 
συνεντεύξεις με τους εμπειρογνώμονες, και άλλα υλικά παρέχονται.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">nos introduce a RNAi, un mecanismo por el cual los
biólogos abajo-regulen la expresión del gene y observen las 
consecuencias fisiológicas. Una serie de experimentos demuestra
la potencia de RNAi en un organismo modelo (elegans del ascáride C.).
Videos, las animaciones, las entrevistas con los expertos, y 
otros materiales se proporcionan.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Sozialwissenschaften</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Les Sciences Sociales</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Ciências Sociais</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Scienze Sociali</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Κοινωνικές επιστήμες</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Ciencias Sociales</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
        <metaMetadata>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oercommons.org</catalog>
            <entry>1770206633</entry>
          </identifier>
          <language>en</language>
        </metaMetadata>
        <educational>
          <language>en</language>
        </educational>
        <rights>
          <copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
            <source>copyrightAndOtherRestrictionsValues</source>
            <value>yes</value>
          </copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
          <description>
            <string language="en">Custom License</string>
          </description>
        </rights>
      </lom>
    </metadata>
  </description>
  <manifestation>
    <identifier>
      <catalog>manifestation-cmr-id</catalog>
      <entry>107546</entry>
    </identifier>
    <name>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.manifestationNameValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>experience</value>
    </name>
    <item>
      <location>
        <uri>http://www.oercommons.org/courses/silencing-genomes</uri>
      </location>
    </item>
  </manifestation>
</expression>
